timeline.message: Updated Heal Reason to use aliases from english.lang and fixed the null errors

timeline.bodyText: A stylistic change, but can you separate these three calls on their own line?

timeline.bodyText: Is this event check working properly? I know you said in Discord before that it wasn't, but is that still the case? Also, if possible, can you add a space after the if and before the curly bracket?

replies.bodyText:
I mean both work,
\S is everything that isn't a space, and \w is any letter of the alphabet or number or _
replies.author: DeltaRays

replies.bodyText: It would be better to follow the rest of the BukkitClasses registered and stick to \\S+

timeline.bodyText: One last minor thing - you should probably import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityRegainHealthEvent.RegainReason directly so you don't need to do EntityRegainHealthEvent.RegainReason.x
